benchmark_details.name: AGENT REWARD BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: AGENT REWARD BENCH is the first benchmark to assess the effectiveness of LLM judges for evaluating web agents. It contains 1302 trajectories across 5 benchmarks and 4 LLMs, aimed at determining the capability of LLMs in automatic evaluation of web agents.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To determine the effectiveness of LLM judges for evaluating web agent trajectories.

data.source: Expert-annotated trajectories from multiple web agent benchmarks.
data.annotation: Annotated by expert reviewers following a structured evaluation framework.

methodology.calculation: Precision is calculated as the ratio of true positives over all predicted positives.
methodology.interpretation: Higher precision indicates better performance in classifying successful trajectories.
